trans-unit.source: Describes a way to paint a region by using one or more tiles.
trans-unit.target: 說明如何使用一個或多個圖格繪製區域。

trans-unit.source: The derived classes of TileBrush define the contents of the tiles that you use to paint a region.
trans-unit.target: TileBrush 衍生的類別中定義您用來繪製區域的圖格的內容。

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> class to paint an area by using an image.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>類別使用的映像繪製區域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>

trans-unit.source: Use a TileBrush to control how you paint an area.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TileBrush 控制繪製區域的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides several types of brushes: - To paint by using an image, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供數種類型的筆刷:-若要使用的映像繪製，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>

trans-unit.source: - To paint by drawing, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>.
trans-unit.target: -若要繪製的繪圖，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>

trans-unit.source: - To paint by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.
trans-unit.target: -若要使用的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush></xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>繪製

trans-unit.source: When you use the TileBrush to paint an area, instead of painting an area by using a single stretched image, you can paint an area by using a series of image tiles that create a pattern.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 TileBrush 繪製區域，而不是繪製區域使用單一延展映像，您可以使用一系列建立模式的影像圖格繪製區域。

trans-unit.source: When you paint an area by using a TileBrush, you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 TileBrush 繪製區域時，您會使用三個元件︰ 內容、 圖格和輸出區域。

trans-unit.source: The following illustrations show how these three TileBrush components relate to each other.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示這三個 TileBrush 元件如何與相關。

trans-unit.source: ![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") Components of a TileBrush with a single tile ![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") Components of a TileBrush with a TileMode of Tile **Content**: A TileBrush can have different types of content: - If the brush is an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>, this content is an image.
trans-unit.target: ![TileBrush 元件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 元件")單一並排顯示 TileBrush 的元件![元件的並排顯示 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "元件的並排顯示 TileBrush")的 TileBrush TileMode 的並排顯示的元件**內容**: TileBrush 可以有不同類型的內容:-如果筆刷<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>，此內容是映像。</xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource%2A> property specifies the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource%2A>屬性會指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>的內容</xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the brush is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>, this content is a drawing.
trans-unit.target: -如果筆刷<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>，此內容是一種繪圖。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush.Drawing%2A> property specifies the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush.Drawing%2A>屬性會指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>的內容</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush.Drawing%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the brush is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>, this content is a visual.
trans-unit.target: -如果筆刷<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>，此內容是視覺效果。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A> property specifies the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>屬性會指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>的內容</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify the position and dimensions of TileBrush content by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用指定的位置和維度的 TileBrush 內容<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Tiles**: A TileBrush produces one or more tiles.
trans-unit.target: **圖格**: TileBrush 會產生一或多個圖格。

trans-unit.source: By default, the content of the brush is stretched to fill a single tile and that tile is stretched to fill the output area.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，筆刷的內容會延伸以填滿單一並排顯示，而且該磚會延伸以填滿輸出區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> property is used to specify the size and position of the base tile for the TileBrush.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>屬性用來指定的大小和位置的基底的並排顯示 TileBrush。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A> property determines whether the size and position of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> are relative to the output area (the default behavior) or whether they are absolute values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A>屬性會決定是否大小和位置<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>是相對於輸出區域 （預設行為），或是否為絕對值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Output Area**: The output area is the area that the brush paints, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A> of an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: **輸出區域**︰ 在輸出區域是例如<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A><xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>的</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A></xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse></xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A>筆刷繪製的區域

trans-unit.source: For more information about the TileBrush class, see [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) .
trans-unit.target: 如需 TileBrush 類別的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用映像、 繪圖和視覺效果繪製](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A TileBrush is a <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> type.
trans-unit.target: 可凍結功能 TileBrush 是<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>型別。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別值由衍生類別的建構函式呼叫時的初始設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of content in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> base tile.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內容的水平對齊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>基底拼貼。

trans-unit.source: The AlignmentX and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentY%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> are used when either of the following conditions is true: - The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> have different aspect ratios.
trans-unit.target: AlignmentX 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentY%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>可用兩者的下列條件為真時:-<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>有不同的外觀比例。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentY%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> are different sizes.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>大小不同。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that you specify the dimensions of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> property; you specify the position and size of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> base tile by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您指定的維度<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>屬性; 您指定的位置和大小<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>使用基底的並排顯示<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the horizontal position of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> content in its base tile.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定的水平位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>其基底磚中的內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentX*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentX*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentX*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of content in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> base tile.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內容的垂直對齊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>基底拼貼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentX%2A> and AlignmentY properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> are used when either of the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> have different aspect ratios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentX%2A>和 AlignmentY 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>下列條件為 true 時使用:-<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>有不同的外觀比例。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentX%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> are different sizes.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>大小不同。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that you specify the dimensions of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> property; you specify the position and size of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> base tile by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您指定的維度<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>屬性; 您指定的位置和大小<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>使用基底的並排顯示<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the vertical position of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> content in its base tile.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定的垂直位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>其基底磚中的內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.AlignmentY"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.AlignmentY"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentY*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentY*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.AlignmentY*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 建立的可修改的複本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>藉由其值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來產生可修改複本的唯讀<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法會複製相依性屬性時，會複製資源參考和資料繫結，但可能已不能再解析也一樣。

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 它不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改深層複本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 複製物件的屬性會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使<> *> 的來源屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> object by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 建立的可修改的複本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>物件藉由其值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, or animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結或動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來產生可修改複本的唯讀<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改深層複本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> prope-rty of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 複製物件的屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使<> *> prope-rty 的來源是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the current bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> content
trans-unit.target: 取得目前範圍<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>內容

trans-unit.source: The output bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: 輸出界限<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the content of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> stretches to fit its tiles.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定如何這個內容<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>兩端之間自動縮放以符合其磚。

trans-unit.source: The Stretch property accepts the following values, which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> enumeration defines: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content does not stretch to fill the tile.
trans-unit.target: Stretch 屬性可以接受下列值，其中<xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>列舉會定義:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>:<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容不會自動縮放以填滿磚。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content is scaled to fit the tile dimensions.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>:<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容會調整為適合的圖格維度。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>

trans-unit.source: However, the aspect ratio of the content is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 不過，會保留外觀比例的內容。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content is scaled so that it completely fills the output area but preserves its original aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>:<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容會調整，讓它完全填滿輸出區域，但會保留其原始長寬比。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content is scaled to fit the tile.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>:<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容會調整為適合磚。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Stretch>

trans-unit.source: Because the content's height and width are scaled independently, the original aspect ratio of the content might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 因為內容的高度和寬度會獨立擴充，則可能不會保留原始外觀比例的內容。

trans-unit.source: That is, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content might be distorted in order to completely fill the output tile.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容可能會扭曲，才能完全填滿輸出磚。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: The following image illustrates the different Stretch settings.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示不同 Stretch 設定。

trans-unit.source: ![Different TileBrush Stretch settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "Different TileBrush Stretch settings") Different stretch settings Note that you specify the dimensions of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> property; you specify the position and size of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> base tile by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![不同的 TileBrush Stretch 設定](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "不同的 TileBrush Stretch 設定")不同的自動縮放設定，請注意，您指定的維度<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>屬性; 您指定的位置和大小<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>使用基底的並排顯示<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: Viewbox Clipping <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> contents are never clipped to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容會永遠不會遭到裁剪至<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> Viewbox 裁剪部分

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> contents *are* clipped to the edges of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>, which sets the dimensions for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> base tile.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容*是*裁剪邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>，可設定的維度<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>基底拼貼。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the effect of different Stretch settings on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> that has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> that is smaller than its <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示根據<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush><xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>小於其<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>具有</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>不同 Stretch 設定的效果

trans-unit.source: The parts of the image that are outside the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> are tinted gray.
trans-unit.target: 映像以外的組件<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>淡色灰色。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![TileBrush with different Stretch settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "TileBrush with different Stretch settings") TileBrush with different Stretch settings ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrush")具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrush # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies how this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> content is projected onto its base tile.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>內容投射到其基底的並排顯示。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> fills the area that you are painting if the base tile is smaller than the output area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定如何<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>填滿您所繪製如果基底磚小於輸出區域的區域。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the different tile modes, which are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示不同的麻將牌模式中，會由<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileMode>列舉型別。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileMode>

trans-unit.source: ![Different TileBrush TileMode settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-tilemodes.gif "Different TileBrush TileMode settings") Available tile modes for the TileMode enumeration For the TileMode property to have an effect, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> for the brush to a size that is smaller than the area that you are painting (the output area).
trans-unit.target: ![不同的 TileBrush TileMode 設定](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-tilemodes.gif "不同的 TileBrush TileMode 設定")TileMode 列舉 TileMode 屬性造成影響的可用的並排顯示模式，您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>筆刷大小小於您所繪製 （輸出區域） 的區域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> size is equal to or exceeds the output area, the brush produces a single tile that expands to fill the output area, and no tile pattern occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>大小等於或超過輸出區域、 筆刷便會產生單一的磚可展開以填滿輸出區域和任何並排顯示模式，就會發生。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies how the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> tiles fill the output area when the base tile, which is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*> property, is smaller than the output area.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定如何<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>並排顯示填滿輸出區域時的基底磚，所指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*>屬性小於輸出區域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.TileMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.TileMode*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.TileMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position and dimensions of the content in a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> tile.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的位置和維度中內容<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>磚。

trans-unit.source: When you paint an area by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>, you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area.
trans-unit.target: 當您繪製區域使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>，您可以使用三個元件︰ 內容、 圖格和輸出區域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: The Viewbox property specifies the size and position of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content.
trans-unit.target: Viewbox 屬性指定的大小和位置<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how these three <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> components relate to each other.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示如何這三個<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>元件與彼此相關。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: ![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") TileBrush components ![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewboxUnits%2A> property determines whether the Viewbox value is interpreted as a relative or absolute value.
trans-unit.target: ![TileBrush 元件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 元件")TileBrush 元件![元件的並排顯示 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "元件的並排顯示 TileBrush") <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewboxUnits%2A>屬性會決定是否 Viewbox 值會解譯為相對或絕對的值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewboxUnits%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewboxUnits%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewboxUnits%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewboxUnits%2A>

trans-unit.source: Viewbox Clipping <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> contents are never clipped to the Viewbox.
trans-unit.target: Viewbox 裁剪<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容永遠不會裁剪為 Viewbox。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> contents *are* clipped to the edges of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>, which sets the values for the base tile.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容*是*裁剪邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>，它會設定基底的並排顯示的值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the effect of different <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A> settings on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> that has a Viewbox that is smaller than its <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示不同的<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>，其小於其<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> Viewbox</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush></xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>的效果

trans-unit.source: The parts of the image that are outside the Viewbox are tinted gray.
trans-unit.target: 影像的縮放 Viewbox 以外的組件是淡色的灰色。

trans-unit.source: ![TileBrush with different Stretch settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "TileBrush with different Stretch settings") TileBrush with different Stretch settings ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrush")具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrush # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The position and dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: 位置和維度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a rectangle (<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>) that has a <xref:System.Windows.Rect.TopLeft*> of (0,0), and a <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width*> and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height*> of 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是一個矩形 (<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>) 具有<> *> 的 (0，0) 和<> *> 和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height*>為 1。</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox*> value is relative to the bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> contents or whether the value is absolute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox*>值是相對於的週框方塊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>目錄或值是否絕對。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox*>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> indicates that the ViewboxUnits are relative to the bounding box of the content.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>指出 ViewboxUnits 是相對於內容的週框方塊。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>

trans-unit.source: Note that a value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> specifies device independent pixels instead of device pixels, which are device dependent.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>指定裝置無關的像素標記而不是裝置像素，視裝置而定。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when a value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> applies, each pixel represents 1/96th of an inch.
trans-unit.target: 因此，值時<xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>套用，每個像素代表 1/96 英吋。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>

trans-unit.source: You must remember this pixel distinction when you specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> of an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> that has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> as its source.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定時，您必須記得此像素區別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>作為其來源。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you use the standard pixel as a measure, a 300 by 300 pixel image is only one inch in width if the image resolution is 300 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，當您使用標準的像素為量值時，影像 300 x 300 像素時只有一英吋寬的影像解析度是 300 dpi。

trans-unit.source: However, when you want to set an absolute value, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> to (0, 0, 96, 96) in order to include the whole image.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您想要設定絕對值，您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>到 0，0、 96 （96） 以包含整個映像。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify the size and position of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定的大小和位置<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: The ViewboxUnits property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A> value is relative to the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content or whether it is an absolute value.
trans-unit.target: ViewboxUnits 屬性會決定是否<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>值是相對於範圍<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>內容或它是絕對值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox*> value is relative to the bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> contents or whether it is an absolute value.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox*>值是相對於的週框方塊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>內容或它是絕對值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewbox*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewboxUnits*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewboxUnits*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewboxUnits*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position and dimensions of the base tile for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定基底磚的大小和位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you paint an area by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>, you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area.
trans-unit.target: 當您繪製區域使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>，您可以使用三個元件︰ 內容、 圖格和輸出區域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how these three <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> components relate to each other.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示如何這三個<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>元件與彼此相關。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: ![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") Components of a TileBrush with a single tile ![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") Components of a TileBrush with a TileMode of Tile The Viewport property determines the size and position of the tiles in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>.
trans-unit.target: ![TileBrush 元件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 元件")單一並排顯示 TileBrush 的元件![元件的並排顯示 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "元件的並排顯示 TileBrush")元件的 TileBrush TileMode 的並排顯示檢視區屬性會決定大小和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>中磚的位置

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> has a single tile that fills the whole output area.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>有單一的並排顯示填滿整個輸出區域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A> property controls how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content fits into that tile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>屬性會控制如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>將內容放入該磚。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this default behavior and specify the tile size by using the Viewport property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫此預設行為，並使用檢視區屬性中指定的並排顯示大小。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A> property to specify whether the Viewport uses absolute or relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A>屬性來指定是否在檢視區會使用絕對或相對座標。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the coordinates are relative, they are relative to the size of the output area.
trans-unit.target: 如果是相對座標，它們是相對於輸出區域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The point (0,0) represents the upper-left corner of the output area, and (1,1) represents the lower-right corner of the output area.
trans-unit.target: 點 (0，0) 表示輸出區域中，並在輸出區域 (1，1) 表示右下角的左上角。

trans-unit.source: To specify that the Viewport property uses absolute coordinates, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定檢視區屬性會使用絕對座標，設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the difference in output when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> to either relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示在輸出中的差異，當您設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>以相對或絕對。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Absolute and Relative Viewport Units](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "Absolute and Relative Viewport Units") Relative and absolute ViewportUnits ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![絕對和相對的檢視區單元](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "絕對與相對的檢視區單元")相對與絕對 ViewportUnits # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The position and dimensions of the base tile for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基底磚的大小和位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a rectangle (<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>) with a <xref:System.Windows.Rect.TopLeft*> of (0,0) and a <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width*> and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height*> of 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是一個矩形 (<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>) 與<> *> 的 (0，0) 和<> *> 和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height*>為 1。</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*>, which indicates the size and position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> base tile, is relative to the size of the output area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref>列舉，指定是否值<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*>，表示的大小和位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>基底磚中，相對於輸出區域的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> property determines the size and position of the tiles in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>屬性會決定的大小和位置中<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>磚</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> has a single tile that fills the whole output area.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>有單一的並排顯示填滿整個輸出區域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A> property controls how the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> content fits into that tile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>屬性會控制如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>將內容放入該磚。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Stretch%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this default behavior and specify the tile size by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫此預設行為，並使用指定的圖格大小<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the ViewportUnits property to specify whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> uses absolute or relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ViewportUnits 屬性來指定是否<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>使用絕對或相對座標。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the coordinates are relative, they are relative to the size of the output area.
trans-unit.target: 如果是相對座標，它們是相對於輸出區域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The point (0,0) represents the upper-left corner of the output area, and (1,1) represents the lower-right corner of the output area.
trans-unit.target: 點 (0，0) 表示輸出區域中，並在輸出區域 (1，1) 表示右下角的左上角。

trans-unit.source: To specify that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A> property uses absolute coordinates, set the ViewportUnits property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>屬性會使用絕對座標、 設定至<xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> ViewportUnits 屬性</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the difference in output when you set the ViewportUnits property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> to either relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示在輸出中的差異，當您設定的 ViewportUnits 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>以相對或絕對。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>

trans-unit.source: ![Absolute and Relative Viewport Units](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "Absolute and Relative Viewport Units") Relative and absolute ViewportUnits ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![絕對和相對的檢視區單元](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "絕對與相對的檢視區單元")相對與絕對 ViewportUnits # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*>, which describes the size and position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref> tiles, is relative to the size of the whole output area.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否值<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*>，用來描述的大小和位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>磚，相對於整體的大小是輸出區域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.Viewport*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush.ViewportUnits*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
